units.title: Unit 1: Introduction to Programming
units.description: Explore the basics of programming and computer science.

videos.title: Video 1: Getting Started with Programming
videos.description: Learn about the fundamental concepts of programming.

videos.title: Video 2: Variables and Data Types
videos.description: Understand how variables and data types work in programming.

units.title: Unit 2: Algorithms and Data Structures
units.description: Delve into algorithms and data structures for effective problem-solving.

videos.title: Video 3: Introduction to Algorithms
videos.description: Learn the basics of algorithms and their importance in computing.

videos.title: Video 4: Data Structures Explained
videos.description: Explore common data structures used in computer science.

units.title: Unit 3: Web Development Basics
units.description: Discover the essentials of web development and design.

videos.title: Video 5: Introduction to HTML
videos.description: Learn the fundamentals of HTML for creating web pages.

videos.title: Video 6: CSS Styling Techniques
videos.description: Explore CSS styling and layout techniques for web design.

units.title: Unit 4: Mobile App Development
units.description: Dive into the world of mobile app development for iOS and Android platforms.

videos.title: Video 7: Introduction to Mobile App Development
videos.description: Understand the basics of mobile app development and its importance.

videos.title: Video 8: Building Your First App
videos.description: Learn the step-by-step process of building your first mobile app.

units.title: Unit 5: Database Management
units.description: Explore the principles of database management and design.

videos.title: Video 9: Introduction to Databases
videos.description: Learn the basics of databases and their role in information management.

videos.title: Video 10: Relational Database Concepts
videos.description: Understand the concepts of relational databases and their implementation.
